## Project Summary

A complete Food Distribution ERP system for Dongkies Negosyo Center with modern UI and comprehensive features.

### Completed Features
- ✅ Laravel 11 with Inertia.js and React (TypeScript)
- ✅ User authentication system (Laravel Breeze)
- ✅ Complete user management with CRUD operations
- ✅ Role and permissions management (Spatie Laravel Permission)
- ✅ 4 default roles: Super Admin, Admin, Manager, Employee
- ✅ 18 default permissions for ERP modules
- ✅ Modern UI with Ant Design components
- ✅ Responsive sidebar navigation layout
- ✅ Dark theme with professional styling
- ✅ **Food Distribution Management:**
  - Product management with categories (Frozen Foods, Dry Goods, HORECA)
  - Inventory tracking with stock levels and alerts
  - Supplier management
  - Customer management (Hotels, Restaurants, Catering)
  - Sales orders system
  - Purchase orders system
- ✅ Database migrations and sample data seeders

### Default Login Credentials
- Email: admin@example.com
- Password: password

### Tech Stack
- Backend: Laravel 11
- Frontend: React 18 with TypeScript + Ant Design 5
- Routing: Inertia.js
- Styling: Ant Design + Tailwind CSS
- Database: MySQL
- Permissions: Spatie Laravel Permission

### Running the Application
1. Start Laravel server: `php artisan serve`
2. Start Vite dev server: `npm run dev`
3. Visit: http://localhost:8000

### Food Distribution Features
- **Products**: Manage products with SKU, pricing, stock levels, storage requirements
- **Categories**: Frozen Foods, Dry Goods, HORECA Supplies
- **Suppliers**: Track suppliers with contact info and payment terms
- **Customers**: Manage HORECA clients (Hotels, Restaurants, Catering companies)
- **Orders**: Sales order management with customer tracking
- **Purchase Orders**: Supplier ordering system
- **Inventory**: Real-time stock tracking with low stock alerts
